entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as the one who tried to kill Harry Potter fifteen years ago. ("what prompted Lord Voldemort to try and kill you fifteen years ago")

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character in the conversation with Dumbledore. ("You said, at the end of last term, you were going to tell me everything," said Harry.)

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one having a conversation with Harry Potter. ("There was a pause. 'You said, at the end of last term, you were going to tell me everything,' said Harry.)

entities.name: humphrey belcher
entities.description: Humphrey Belcher is mentioned as someone who made a mistake in believing it was time for a cheese cauldron. ("From hereon in, Harry, I may be as woefully wrong as Humphrey Belcher, who believed the time was ripe for a cheese cauldron.')
